item.title: Using Dear ImGui with SFML for creating awesome game dev tools
item.description: Related article: Using ImGui with modern C++ and STL This is the first part of tutorial about Dear ImGui (AKA ImGui) and it’ll show you how to set it up with SFML. The second part will be library agnostic and will talk about common ways of doing stuff in ImGui, some awesome widgets and some useful STL overloads. Different Dear ImGui widgets Table Of Contents Introduction Dear ImGui and immediate mode GUI concept Using ImGui-SFML Option A.
